CDM/vtkbioeng/vtkBufferOutputWindow.h

00001 /*=========================================================================
00002 
00003   Program:   Visualization Toolkit
00004   Module:    vtkBufferOutputWindow.h
00005   Language:  C++
00006   RCS:   $Id: vtkBufferOutputWindow.h,v 1.1 2007/02/16 02:44:10 glawlor Exp $

00010 =========================================================================*/
00011 // .NAME vtkBufferOutputWindow - 
00012 // .SECTION Description
00013 // Writes debug/warning/error output to a buffer (a class variable) which can be accessed from a 
00014 // wrapped language (tcl etc.). The class invokes ErrorEvent, WarningEvent, GenericWarningEvent and
00015 // UserEvent (ie DebugEvent doesn't exist) which can be observed and a callback triggered to get the 
00016 // output text.
00017 //
00018 // To use this class, instantiate it and then call SetInstance(this).
00019 
00020 
00021 #ifndef __vtkBufferOutputWindow_h
00022 #define __vtkBufferOutputWindow_h
00023 
00024 #include "vtkOutputWindow.h"
00025 #include "vtkBioengConfigure.h" // Include configuration header.
00026 
00027 
00028 class VTK_BIOENG_EXPORT vtkBufferOutputWindow : public vtkOutputWindow
00029 {
00030 public:
00031   vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkBufferOutputWindow, vtkOutputWindow);
00032 
00033   static vtkBufferOutputWindow* New();
00034   
00035 //BTX
00036   enum TextType
00037   {
00038       TEXT,
00039       WARNING_TEXT,
00040       ERROR_TEXT,
00041       GENERIC_WARNING_TEXT,
00042       DEBUG_TEXT
00043   };
00044 //ETX
00045 
00046   // Description:
00047   // Get the last text type: 0 = TEXT; 1 = WARNING_TEXT; 2 = ERROR_TEXT; 
00048   // 3 = GENERIC_WARNING_TEXT; 4 = DEBUG_TEXT
00049   vtkGetMacro(LastOutputTextType, int);
00050 
00051   // Description:
00052   // the output window api
00053   virtual void DisplayText(const char*);
00054   virtual void DisplayErrorText(const char*);
00055   virtual void DisplayWarningText(const char*);
00056   virtual void DisplayGenericWarningText(const char*);
00057   virtual void DisplayDebugText(const char*);
00058 
00059   
00060   // Description:
00061   // Get the last message
00062   vtkGetStringMacro(LastOutputText);
00063   
00064   // Description:
00065   // Get the last message type... error, warning etc.
00066   char *GetLastOutputTextTypeAsString();
00067 
00068 
00069  protected:
00070   vtkBufferOutputWindow(); 
00071   virtual ~vtkBufferOutputWindow(); 
00072   
00073   char *LastOutputText;
00074   int LastOutputTextType;
00075 
00076   private:
00077   vtkBufferOutputWindow(const vtkBufferOutputWindow&);  // Not implemented.
00078   void operator=(const vtkBufferOutputWindow&);  // Not implemented.
00079 };
00080 
00081 inline char *vtkBufferOutputWindow::GetLastOutputTextTypeAsString(void)
00082 {
00083   if ( this->LastOutputTextType == TEXT )
00084     {
00085     return (char *)"Text";
00086     }
00087   else if ( this->LastOutputTextType == ERROR_TEXT )
00088     {
00089     return (char *)"Error Text";
00090     }
00091   else if ( this->LastOutputTextType == WARNING_TEXT )
00092     {
00093     return (char *)"Warning Text";
00094     }
00095   else if ( this->LastOutputTextType == GENERIC_WARNING_TEXT )
00096     {
00097     return (char *)"Generic Warning Text";
00098     }
00099   else
00100     {
00101     return (char *)"Debug Text";
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 #endif
